text: thumb|upright=2.2|Countries with airlines that operate the Boeing 787 or with aircraft on firm order as of September 2016. The following is a list of current commercial operators of the Boeing 787. == Airline operators == An Air India 787-8. A Qatar Airways 787-8. El Al Boeing 787-9 (Retro livery) An EVA Air 787-9 at Vienna International Airport A United Airlines 787-9. A Biman Bangladesh Airlines 787-8. An Air India 787-8 in special Star Alliance livery. An EgyptAir 787-9. An Etihad Airways 787-10. There were 1121 Boeing 787 aircraft in airline service , comprising 353 787-8s, 476 787-9s and 35 787-10s. The largest operators were All Nippon Airways (71), American Airlines (46), United Airlines (46), Japan Airlines (42), Air Canada (37), Norwegian Air Shuttle (37), Etihad Airways (34), Qatar Airways (30), British Airways (30), Air India (27), and other airlines operating fewer of the type. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; background:#fbf8db" |- style="background-color:#ccddff" ! rowspan="2"|Operator ! rowspan="2"|First commercial service ! colspan="5" |Number in service |- style="background-color:#ccddff" ! 787-8 ! 787-9 ! 787-10 !
